This game quite old, but that hasn't stopped it from gaining player count. Fun strategic game play makes for entertaining and sometimes awfully hilarious moments. It's even more fun with friends, although I am not really a fan of the random AK-47 headshots but it's still a good game. Would recommend it  8/10
